parameters.toolDescription: Retrieves a service case by its display ID (user-friendly identifier like 'GFMS1-6175' or 'Hawk8-0001'). Use when users ask 'get case ABC-123', 'show me case XYZ-456', 'analyze case GFMS1-6175'. Returns complete case details including machine snapshots, audit log, closing report, and timeline information. Automatically applies role-based access control.
